notFound.redirectButton: Take me back to the welcome page

welcome.title: <0>Find out our web app Radarin</0>
welcome.description: <0>Radarin is an application that allows you to keep in touch with your friends. The behaviour is simple: go outside and Radarin will let you know if there is a friend nearby. Do not miss another opportunity to socialize.</0>
welcome.fairUsageText: It is very easy to use Radarin, in the map you can see if there is a friend inside your zone. In the friends menu you can add an user to your friends list. In the options menu you can configure some parameters like the searching radius or the time refresh for updating your location. More functionalities will be implemented as the development progresses.
welcome.contactUsText:
<0>
If you have any additional question or suggestion, contact with <1>support@radarin.com<1>.</0>

editor.explanation: This simple text editor enables you to create a plaintext file and save it in a Pod. To make this very clear for the demo you provide a URL as an absolute path to the file in the Pod. The Pod can be the one this App has been logged into or another person's Pod. To write, and read, into another person's Pod the owner will have had to provide you with write permission.
